translation.en: [man 1] What the hell?
[man 2] This way! This way! Whoo-hoo!
[men chanting in Latin] Thus has it always been, and thus shall it ever be.
translation.it: Così è sempre stato e così sarà sempre.

translation.en: [Neil] "Do not weep for me For I have not gone"
translation.it: "Non piangere per me, non sono andato via

translation.en: "I am the wind that shakes the mighty oak"
translation.it: Sono il vento Che scuote la possente quercia

translation.en: "I am the gentle rain That falls upon your face"
translation.it: Sono la pioggia leggera Che cade sul tuo viso

translation.en: "I am the spring flower That pushes through the dark earth"
translation.it: Sono il fiore primaverile Che spunta dalla terra scura

translation.en: "I am the chuckling laughter Of the mountain stream"
translation.it: Sono il ridacchiare Del ruscello di montagna"

translation.en: [vicar] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
translation.it: "Anche se cammino nella valle dell'ombra della morte, non temo alcun male.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
translation.it: La Tua verga e il Tuo bastone mi difendono.

translation.en: We commit our brother to the ground.
Earth to earth,
ashes to ashes,
dust to dust.
-Maya Stern. -Military?
No. I'm in fancy dress.
Me too. Penguin.
-[imitates penguin] -[chuckles] Very convincing.
So, seeing as we're both here at this ridiculous charity party,
translation.it: Visto che siamo qui a questa ridicola festa di beneficenza,

translation.en: would you allow me to buy you a drink?
What, from the free bar?
Have whatever you want. My treat.
translation.it: Prendi quello che vuoi. Offro io.

translation.en: I should warn you,
in 11 hours, I'll be on a plane back to base.
translation.it: tra 11 ore sarò su un aereo per tornare alla base.

translation.en: Well, in that case, we'd better make the most of the time that we have,
translation.it: Allora dobbiamo sfruttare al massimo il nostro tempo,

translation.en: Captain.
[Maya sobbing] Joe! Joe, Joe!
Come on, darling.
-You okay? -[Maya] Yeah, thanks, Shane.
-Detective Kierce. -Oh, Maya, these are excellent.
What are they? Vol-au-vents?
What, you've come for the catering? Or you've found my husband's killer?
translation.it: È venuto per mangiare o ha trovato l'assassino di mio marito?

translation.en: Ah, Joe's mum invited me.
translation.it: Mi ha invitato la madre di Joe.

translation.en: [Maya] Oh. Well, you'd think a psychiatrist would know better.
translation.it: E pensare che fa la psichiatra.

translation.en: Not today, but there's some things I need to follow up on, about the attack.
translation.it: Non oggi, ma dovrei chiederle alcune cose sull'aggressione.

translation.en: Look, I have given you three statements, and you're no closer to catching them.
translation.it: Ho già fatto tre dichiarazioni e non li ha ancora presi.

translation.en: Your shoelace, it's undone.
Why did you invite that detective?
I wanted him to see who Joe was.
translation.it: Volevo che vedesse chi era Joe.

translation.en: That he was important.
That he was loved by his brothers and sister.
translation.it: Che era amato dai fratelli e dalla sorella.

translation.en: That he grew up in this big house
translation.it: Che è cresciuto in questa grande casa

translation.en: where he spent his childhood.
How are you coping?
I'm grieving.
I lost the love of my life.
No, I'm grieving.
There's something more going on with you.
translation.it: Tu stai vivendo qualcosa di più.

translation.en: I'm fine.
I don't want to push you today, but I think you should get help.
translation.it: Oggi non voglio insistere, ma dovresti farti aiutare.

translation.en: There's so much you're dealing with. First, you lose your sister.
translation.it: Stai affrontando tante cose. Prima hai perso tua sorella.

translation.en: Now, Joe.
And all that army business.
I'd better attend to the guests.
[Eva] Whose idea was hymns?
Who do you think?
I must have told them ten times, play The Doors,
translation.it: Gliel'avrò detto dieci volte, mettete i Doors,

translation.en: play… Nirvana.
[in posh voice] Play Nirvana? At a funeral?
translation.it: Mettere i Nirvana? A un funerale?

translation.en: -Do you know how much they spent? -Go on.
The coffin cost more than your car.
translation.it: La bara costa più della tua auto.

translation.en: [grunts] Well, that's not saying much.
I don't want to leave you.
I'll be fine.
Look, I know you think you will,
but I don't care if it's 3:00 in the morning,
translation.it: ma anche alle tre del mattino, se hai un momento di crisi…

translation.en: if you have a wobble… yeah?
translation.it: ma anche alle tre del mattino, se hai un momento di crisi… Va bene?

translation.en: Oh, which reminds me. -I've got something for you. -Oh?
translation.it: A proposito, ho qualcosa per te.

translation.en: [Eva] It is…
a digital picture frame.
It rotates photos of you and your family.
translation.it: Mostra a rotazione foto di te e della tua famiglia.

translation.en: Okay…
I've already pre-loaded some of you, Joe, Lily, and the family.
translation.it: Ne ho già caricate alcune di te, Joe, Lily e i parenti.

translation.en: Except, that's not all it is.
Ready?
[chuckles] Do you want to see that funky move again? Please.
translation.it: - Vuoi rivedere quel balletto? - Ti prego.

translation.en: Well, you can. It's all caught on here, on a secret camera,
translation.it: Beh, puoi farlo. È tutto ripreso da una telecamera nascosta,

translation.en: which records when there's movement.
Why have you got me a secret camera?
So you can keep an eye on Lily when you're not here.
translation.it: Così puoi tenere d'occhio Lily quando non ci sei.

translation.en: -When she's with Izabella? -Exactly. Nanny cam.
translation.it: - Quando è con Izabella? - Esatto. Una telecamera per la tata.

translation.en: I'm sure Izabella's great, but what harm does it do to keep an eye on her?
translation.it: Izabella sarà magnifica, ma che male può fare tenerla d'occhio?

translation.en: Eva, her family's and Joe's go way back.
translation.it: Eva, Joe conosceva la sua famiglia da sempre.

translation.en: Well, I am putting it in her playroom.
translation.it: Beh, la metto nella stanza dei giochi.

translation.en: -Hi. -[man] Morning.
Ready for your next lesson? -Yeah, can't wait. -Let's go.
translation.it: - Pronto per la lezione? Andiamo. - Certo.

translation.en: Okay, you can take her up today.
translation.it: Ok, oggi fai tu il decollo.

translation.en: Okay?
If you'd like to take a slight turn to the left.
Okay, will do.
[Maya] That's good.
Right. Keep-- Keep your eyes on the horizon.
That's a nasty graze to his elbow there.
Is that what they teach military police? -I was aiming for his elbow. -Ah.
translation.it: - Insegnano questo alla polizia militare? - Puntavo lì.

translation.en: Want a turn?
No. Wouldn't want to embarrass you.
translation.it: No. Non vorrei metterti in imbarazzo.

translation.en: How long have you been back at work?
-Three days. -Right.
-What? -Nothing.
What am I supposed to do?
Sit at home, stare at a wall?
No, but, you know…
It's my grief, Shane.
-We need some normality. -Okay.
Listen, me and the guys, we were talking…
translation.it: Senti, io e i ragazzi dicevamo…

translation.en: -Oh, go on. -How about we come over this weekend?
translation.it: - Vai. - E se venissimo da te nel weekend?

translation.en: Nothing crazy. Just a few drinks. Keep you company.
translation.it: Beviamo un po'. Ti teniamo compagnia.

translation.en: So, it's too soon for me to be back in work,
translation.it: Quindi è troppo presto per tornare al lavoro,

translation.en: -but not for a piss-up, hmm? -[buzzer sounds]
Hello?
-[gasps] -[Lily] Mummy!
-[Maya] Hey! Good girl. -[Lily giggles]
-Hi! -Hi, Maya. Hi. Has everything been all right?
translation.it: - Ciao. È andato tutto bene? - Ciao, Maya.

translation.en: Of course. We've had fun, haven't we, Lily? Yeah?
translation.it: Certo. Ci siamo divertite, vero, Lily?

translation.en: We made…
-Angels. -Yeah, that's right.
[Maya] You made angels?
-[Izabella] Why don't you show Mummy? -Go on. Go on.
-[Lily] Come. Come with me. -[Maya] You go in. One minute.
translation.it: Vieni con me. Tu vai. Arrivo subito.

translation.en: -[Lily giggles] -She's been talking about heaven, so I-- Yeah, no, it's fine. It's fine.
translation.it: - Ha parlato del paradiso, così… - Sì, va bene.

translation.en: Listen, you get off, um…
It's fine. I'm going to, uh, look at these amazing angels.
translation.it: Io vado a vedere questi fantastici angeli.

translation.en: See you, darling.
[gasps] Oh, clever girl!
Wow, show me. Show me.
-I'm winning. -Oh, big girl.
Ready…
Right, Lily.
Right, breakfast. Go and sit down.
Go and sit in your chair.
Good girl. Here.
Hi, Judith. Listen, I'm just rushing off to work.
translation.it: Ciao, Judith. Devo scappare al lavoro.

translation.en: Can I call you back?
I thought you could come over to Farnwood this weekend with Lily.
translation.it: Perché non vieni a Farnwood questo weekend con Lily?

translation.en: That's kind of you, um, but I can't this weekend.
translation.it: Sei gentile. Ma non posso. Vedo degli amici.

translation.en: -I've arranged to see friends. -She spent a lot of time here, Maya,
translation.it: Ma non posso. Vedo degli amici. Lei ha passato qui molto tempo, quando eri via.

translation.en: when you were away.
translation.it: Lei ha passato qui molto tempo, quando eri via.

translation.en: I know you're not used to being a full-time mother, but children need their routines.
translation.it: Non sei abituata a stare a casa, ma ai bambini serve regolarità.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know.
Listen, why don't I call you later and we can arrange another day?
translation.it: Ti chiamo più tardi e organizziamo per un altro giorno?

translation.en: Okay. Yes. Call me later.
I'm only thinking about what's best for Lily.
translation.it: Voglio solo il meglio per Lily.

translation.en: All right, bye.
Unbelievable.
[Maya] Lily.
-Did you see Daddy? -Dada.
Did you see Daddy yesterday when I wasn't here?
translation.it: L'hai visto ieri mentre non c'ero?

translation.en: He came over, and he-- and he gave you a cuddle, and he sat you on his lap?
translation.it: È venuto, ti ha abbracciato e ti ha fatto sedere sulle sue gambe?

translation.en: Okay. All right, Mommy's being silly. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Ok. La mamma è una sciocca. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: Fuck.
Mrs. Burkett?
Can I speak with you?
-Now? -Yes, now.
I need to show you something.
[Izabella] What is this?
[Maya] It's a camera.
-You record me? -Just watch.
-You're spying on me? -Right, just watch, watch.
-How do you explain this? -I don't know what you mean.
translation.it: - Come lo spieghi? - Non so cosa intende.

translation.en: That man there, you saw him. You saw who that was?
-Who? -What do you mean, "Who?"
-It's Joe! How the hell can that be? -Please, Mrs. Burkett, you're scaring me!
translation.it: - È Joe! Com'è possibile? - La prego, mi spaventa!

translation.en: Look. It's fucking Joe.
-He's dead, Izabella. -You're hurting me.
translation.it: - È morto, Izabella. - Mi fa male.

translation.en: He's dead, and he's there on the camera whilst you were in the house.
translation.it: È morto e la telecamera l'ha ripreso mentre tu eri in casa.

translation.en: [Lily] Momma!
It's all right, darling. Just go back in and watch your show.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, tesoro. Torna a vedere il cartone.

translation.en: Go on. It's all right. It's okay.
I want answers.
I need some water.
-Ow! Fuck! -[glass shatters]
What the hell happened?
Got pepper sprayed.
-Pepper sprayed? -Yeah, by my nanny.
translation.it: - Spray al peperoncino? - Sì, la tata.

translation.en: Are you serious?
No. No, I'm a gifted comedian.
Nothing warms up a crowd like the "pepper spray nanny" routine.
translation.it: È una scenetta per scaldare il pubblico.

translation.en: All right, Maya. That's a serious offense.
[Maya] Oh God.
You okay?
Can I ask what prompted it?
I saw something on my nanny cam, and I challenged her about it.
translation.it: Ho visto qualcosa nella telecamera e le ho chiesto spiegazioni.

translation.en: Okay. What did you see?
-It's going to sound crazy. -Try me.
[Maya] It's gone.
-Gone? -[sputtering] Yeah, the SD card is gone.
translation.it: - Sparita? - La scheda SD è sparita.

translation.en: -All right. -She must have taken it.
-After she pepper sprayed you? -Yes.
So, what was on it?
Joe. So it was, uh…
-It was an old tape. -No, it wasn't. It was from yesterday.
translation.it: - un vecchio filmato. - No, era di ieri.

translation.en: -You know that-- You know that can't be. -He was wearing his green shirt.
translation.it: Sa che non è possibile. Indossava la camicia verde. Non è nell'armadio, e neanche le scarpe.

translation.en: That's not in his wardrobe. Or his shoes.
translation.it: Indossava la camicia verde. Non è nell'armadio, e neanche le scarpe.

translation.en: Are you sure it was Joe, Maya?
He went to Lily, and she cuddled him.
translation.it: È andato da Lily e lei l'ha abbracciato.

translation.en: Did you ask Lily?
She said he wasn't here.
You know…
-Grief can do funny things. -It's not grief.
translation.it: - Il dolore può confondere. - Non è quello.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, it's all right.
Look, I'm fine. I'm just…
-[clears throat] Okay. -You wanted to ask me a few questions?
Yeah, if you're okay now.
Thanks.
In your original statement on the night of the attack,
translation.it: Nella sua dichiarazione la sera dell'aggressione,

translation.en: you said two masked youths appeared in the park on scramble bikes.
translation.it: ha detto che due giovani mascherati sono apparsi nel parco su delle moto.

translation.en: Yeah.
And then you said they stopped in front of you and attempted to grab your bag.
translation.it: Poi si sono fermati davanti a lei e hanno cercato di afferrarle la borsa.

translation.en: Correct.
Right, and then, um…
And then you said…
I resisted. A fight broke out.
translation.it: L'ho stretta. C'è stata una colluttazione.

translation.en: Um, one of them had hold of my bag, he wouldn't let go, and I, uh, was pushed.
translation.it: Uno teneva la borsa e non la mollava, e sono stata spinta.

translation.en: I fell backwards.
They were demanding that Joe handed over his wallet, and he wouldn't.
translation.it: Volevano che Joe desse loro il portafogli, ma non l'ha fatto.

translation.en: Then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
he pulled out a gun.
I tried to call for help.
But before I could, I just heard…
By the time I got to Joe…
he was on the floor.
Dying.
Joe! Joe, Joe, Joe…
Besides a very detailed description of the suspects,
translation.it: Oltre a fare una descrizione precisa dei due,

translation.en: you were able to tell us that the youth in the red Nike trainers
translation.it: lei ha detto che il ragazzo con le scarpe rosse Nike

translation.en: was carrying a 9-millimeter Glock 17.
that's very impressive.
To identify a weapon like that.
[inhales] I was issued one. Overseas.
translation.it: Ne avevo una in dotazione. In missione.

translation.en: Do you miss the army?
I loved combat.
The adrenaline.
The fear.
It was addictive.
But that's all over now.
As you know, despite never finding the weapon itself,
translation.it: Come sa, nonostante non abbiamo trovato l'arma,

translation.en: we recovered three bullets from your husband's body
translation.it: abbiamo rinvenuto tre proiettili nel corpo di suo marito

translation.en: and three cases from the scene consistent with a Glock 17.
translation.it: e tre bossoli compatibili con una Glock 17.

translation.en: Now, you own guns, don't you, Maya?
translation.it: Lei possiede delle armi, vero, Maya?

translation.en: Yes.
Do you keep any of them here?
[Maya] They're in here.
No one can get their hands on them, especially Lily.
translation.it: Nessuno può prenderle, tanto meno Lily.

translation.en: Well, how do you open it?
Thumbprint.
That's, uh, quite the collection. Does anyone else have access to these?
translation.it: Un bell'arsenale. Qualcun altro vi ha accesso?

translation.en: No. Well, Joe used to. But…
translation.it: No. Beh, un tempo Joe, ma…

translation.en: What's that?
It's old.
Deactivated.
-[Sami] Glock 17? -Yeah.
-[Sami] Is this your only handgun? -Yep. The only one.
translation.it: È la sua unica pistola? Sì. L'unica.

translation.en: And it's legally registered as deactivated.
translation.it: Ed è legalmente registrata come disattivata.

translation.en: As I'm sure you already know.
So shall we stop playing games and you tell me what it is that you want?
translation.it: Può smetterla coi giochetti e dirmi cosa vuole?

translation.en: What I want, Maya,
is to go away and test it. Go on.
-What, you think I killed my husband? -No, Maya.
translation.it: Crede abbia ucciso mio marito? No, Maya.

translation.en: You buried him. I was there.
So he wasn't on the nanny cam.
[Molly] Hi.
Hiya, sweetheart. How was your day?
Yeah, good. Well, I say good.
I had a six-year-old say "bellend" this morning.
translation.it: Uno di sei anni ha detto "stronzo".

translation.en: -[chuckling] -Had to ring his parents.
-And were they bellends? -Most definitely.
So, tonight, you got your dancing shoes ready?
translation.it: Hai preparato le scarpe da ballo?

translation.en: Of course.
Right, and don't forget, 6:00 p.m.
Yeah? And it's side together, side tap, side together. Yes?
translation.it: Ed è insieme di lato, tap di lato, insieme di lato. Ok?

translation.en: Love you.
[chuckles] Love you too. Bye.
[man] And there's a board members' call at 2:45.
translation.it: C'è una chiamata del consiglio alle 14:45.

translation.en: -It's in your diary. -Mm. Joy of joys.
Excuse me.
Oh. Daughter-in-law.
Reconsidering my offer?
No, um…
I need to ask you something about Joe.
translation.it: Devo chiederti una cosa su Joe.

translation.en: What is it?
When you, uh… when you went to see him…
-to… identify his body… -[mysterious music playing]
Yes?
What did he look like?
Why on earth would you ask me that?
"What did he look like?" What sort of a question is that, Maya?
translation.it: "Che aspetto aveva?" Ma che domanda è?

translation.en: Because I never saw his body.
Maya, please. I urge you to think again about counseling.
translation.it: Maya, ti prego. Ripensa ad andare in terapia.

translation.en: I have an excellent colleague at the clinic. Specializes in grief.
translation.it: Ho un ottimo collega alla clinica. È specializzato in lutto.

translation.en: I don't need counseling.
Please, just tell me what he looked like.
translation.it: Per favore, dimmi che aspetto aveva.

translation.en: -There's no stigma attached to it, Maya. -Judith.
translation.it: - Non è una vergogna, Maya. - Judith.

translation.en: He looked like what he was.
Beautiful.
But a body.
Everything that made him Joe
translation.it: Tutto ciò che lo rendeva Joe

translation.en: was gone.
-All right, thank you. -[man] Okay, mate.
[Sami] Yep. All right. Yep.
Cheers. All right. Thanks. Yeah.
Oh, God.
[Pam] A cat?
[chuckles dryly] Yeah, from nowhere. It jumped out, I swerved.
translation.it: Sì, è saltato fuori dal nulla. Ho sterzato.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I've hit a fence.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Not a scratch, unlike the car.
translation.it: - Stai bene? - Sì. Sono illeso, a differenza dell'auto.

translation.en: -Can I have a replacement? -Most likely.
translation.it: - Posso averne un'altra? - Penso di sì.

translation.en: But, Sami, I'm just going to ask you this straight.
translation.it: Ma, Sami, te lo chiedo esplicitamente.

translation.en: -Oh, come on, Pam. -You've had your challenges.
translation.it: Andiamo, Pam. Hai avuto dei problemi.

translation.en: And I know you've risen to meet them, but we're all capable of--
translation.it: So che ti sei rialzato, ma tutti possiamo…

translation.en: One thousand, two hundred seventy-eight days sober.
Do you know how long that is? Nearly three and a half years.
translation.it: Sai quanti sono? Quasi tre anni e mezzo.

translation.en: -You're getting married. -And?
Oh, come on, Sami. Are you sure the wedding's not bringing back
translation.it: Dai, Sami. Sicuro che le nozze non ti riportino alla mente

translation.en: unhappy memories of what happened last time?
It was a cat.
It was an accident.
It was a complete freak event.
[Pam] Okay, fine.
I'm partnering you up on the Joe Burkett case.
translation.it: Ti do un partner per il caso.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Come on.
Marty McGreggor. He's young, he's bright,
translation.it: Marty McGreggor. È giovane, brillante e imparerà da un uomo più maturo.

translation.en: and he'll benefit from the wisdom of an older man.
translation.it: È giovane, brillante e imparerà da un uomo più maturo.

translation.en: So I'm being babysat by a child?
translation.it: Quindi un ragazzino baderà a me?

translation.en: Don't see it as babysitting.
-[Sami groans] -See it as someone to help you avoid cats.
translation.it: Diciamo che ti aiuterà a evitare i gatti.

translation.en: [Marty] Oh my God, this is-- this is so exciting.
Sir, I'm really stoked to be…
You know, I think we'll be a really good team.
-Oh God. -I think-- Are you-- Are you stoked?
Just here. Yeah. Yes, yes, I'm stoked. Very stoked.
This is where the attack happened. Do you know who Margrete was?
translation.it: È qui che è avvenuta l'aggressione. Sai chi era Margrete?

translation.en: -Oh, a painter, was she? -No.
The ruler of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden in the 1300s.
translation.it: La sovrana di Danimarca, Norvegia e Svezia nel 1300.

translation.en: Now, you're probably thinking…
-[slurping] -…why does she have a corner
in a UK park?
[Marty gulps drink] Uh, yeah, why?
-Fuck knows. -Ah. [chuckles softly]
But she does.
And this is where Joe Burkett was murdered on the night of the 12th.
translation.it: Ed è qui che Joe Burkett è stato ucciso la sera del 12.

translation.en: The wife's statement's all we have to go on.
translation.it: Abbiamo solo la versione della moglie.

translation.en: Come on.
You know she left the army under controversial circumstances?
translation.it: Ha lasciato l'esercito per cause controverse.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It was a kind of a whistleblower thing, right?
translation.it: Sì. Per via di un informatore, no?

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, she killed innocent civilians. Corey the Whistle leaked the details.
translation.it: Ha ucciso civili. Corey the Whistle l'ha divulgato.

translation.en: -People wanted her in prison. I remember. -Yeah.
translation.it: - La volevano tutti in galera. - Sì.

translation.en: Yeah, and then-- then…
And then today, she claimed to see her dead husband alive.
translation.it: E poi oggi ha affermato di aver visto vivo il marito morto.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Nice me says,
she's in grief.
She lost her sister and her husband in a short period of time,
translation.it: Ha perso sua sorella e suo marito in poco tempo,

translation.en: and she's seeing things. But…
translation.it: e si immagina le cose. Ma…

translation.en: …the cynical me says,
if she did do it, maybe she's trying to show us that she's losing it,
translation.it: se è stata lei, forse cerca di dimostrarci che è pazza,

translation.en: you know, to plead diminished responsibility.
translation.it: sai, per avere una riduzione della pena.

translation.en: Well… does she have a motive?
Well, you learn motive isn't always clear.
translation.it: Beh, il movente non è sempre chiaro.

translation.en: -You know, we dig. -Right.
-We find reasons. -Okay.
Oh, well, uh, rich family. I mean, Burkett Global Enterprises. Kerching!
translation.it: Oh, famiglia ricca. La Burkett Global Enterprises fa i soldi.

translation.en: Is she in line for a big payout?
Some life insurance. But most of the money goes into trust for their daughter,
translation.it: L'assicurazione, ma va quasi tutta nel fondo fiduciario per la figlia.

translation.en: but that was all pre-agreed years ago.
translation.it: È stato tutto concordato anni fa.

translation.en: So, well, maybe it is exactly as she says, you know.
translation.it: Forse allora è proprio come dice lei.

translation.en: Two kids on motorbikes.
Yeah. Yeah.
Which is why we need a ballistics check on her gun.
translation.it: Ci serve un esame balistico della pistola.

translation.en: Right.
Oh, but yeah. Okay, I'll get on it. [chuckles]
Yeah. And while you're there, chase them up on the bullets.
translation.it: Sì. E già che ci sei, chiedi dei proiettili.

translation.en: I requested a matching review to see if the killer's gun could be linked to any other incidents.
translation.it: Ho chiesto di verificare se la pistola può essere collegata ad altri casi.

translation.en: -Ballistics, bullets. Yes, Cap. -Hey, whoa.
Don't. Never-- Never do that again. Just…
No "Cap."
What… What is that?
Oh, it's, uh, chocolate, whey protein, spinach, and a little bit of banana.
translation.it: Cioccolata, siero di latte, spinaci e un po' di banana.

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you want to…
-You should… -I should. Yeah, okay, well, I'll…
-I'll see you-- I'll see you back at-- -Yep.
[groans] God help me.
Hello, you reach Izabella. Please leave a message and I'll get back to you.
translation.it: Ciao, sono Izabella. Lasciate un messaggio e vi richiamerò.

translation.en: Call Charlie.
-Hello? -Charlie, it's Maya.
Have you seen Izabella up your way?
Uh, yeah, I think I saw her come back a little while ago.
translation.it: Sì, l'ho vista rientrare poco fa.

translation.en: -Think she's at the house in the grounds. -All right. Okay. Thanks. Bye.
translation.it: - Credo sia nella casetta. - Va bene. Grazie, ciao.

translation.en: -[Lily humming] -Come on then.
[Maya] Yeah.
-Hi, Lily. Hi, Auntie Maya. -Hi, Dan. We haven't seen you in ages.
translation.it: - Ciao, Lily. Ciao, zia Maya. - Ciao, Dan. Non ci vediamo da secoli.

translation.en: -Sorry, Auntie Maya. -[chuckles] Is your dad in?
translation.it: - Scusa, zia Maya. - C'è tuo padre?

translation.en: -Yeah, just inside. -Yeah. Come on, then.
Hey.
[Maya] There you go. Go and find Abby.
-[Abby] Hey, Lily! Hello. -[gentle music playing]
[Maya] Always amazing.
-Eddie. -All right.
Do you mind looking after Lily for me for an hour? I need to speak to someone.
translation.it: Ti dispiace badare a Lily? Devo parlare con qualcuno.

translation.en: Yeah, whatever.
-Auntie Maya! -Abby! Aw!
I'll come and see you today. Maybe second half.
translation.it: Oggi vengo a vederti. Forse al secondo tempo.

translation.en: -You don't need to. -No, I want to.
translation.it: - Non devi. - No, mi fa piacere.

translation.en: -How are you getting there? -[Eddie] How do you think?
translation.it: - Come vai lì? - Tu che pensi?

translation.en: What, with that in your hand?
One drink. I'm fine.
I don't drink and drive, Maya. It's one drink.
translation.it: Non guido ubriaco, Maya. È una birra.

translation.en: It's bad enough that the kids are living in the house that their mum was killed in.
translation.it: I ragazzi devono già vivere nella casa in cui è stata uccisa la madre.

translation.en: The boxes…
Let me take them out.
-I'm dealing with it. -Saying that for weeks.
translation.it: - Faccio io. - Lo dici da settimane.

translation.en: Well, maybe you'll understand when you start to throw Joe's stuff.
translation.it: Inizia a buttare le cose di Joe e lo capirai.

translation.en: Know how it feels now, don't you?
translation.it: Ora sai cosa si prova, no?

translation.en: Please, let me help.
-My wife, my problem. -Yeah, and my sister, Eddie.
translation.it: - Moglie mia, problema mio. - Era mia sorella.

translation.en: I think that trumps marriage.
I know I wasn't here as much as she'd have liked.
translation.it: Non ci sono stata quanto avrebbe voluto.

translation.en: But you were off saving the world?
She hated you being away. You know that.
translation.it: Odiava il fatto che fossi via. Lo sai.

translation.en: She was worried every shithole conflict you went to would be your last,
translation.it: Temeva che ogni merdosa guerra per cui partivi sarebbe stata l'ultima,

translation.en: and one day she'd get a call telling her as much.
translation.it: e che avrebbe ricevuto quella telefonata.

translation.en: But it was the other way around.
Hiya.
-Hey. -Why are you at Farnwood?
I've been, uh, updating Judith. How's the nanny situation?
translation.it: Sto aggiornando Judith. Come va con la tata?

translation.en: Right.
Well, I'm going to see Izabella now to talk about it.
translation.it: Sto andando ora da Izabella per parlarle.

translation.en: Asking what?
If she saw Joe.
-Why she took my SD card. -Come on, Maya.
translation.it: - Perché ha preso la SD. - Dai.

translation.en: Listen, I know.
Maybe I am going crazy.
But she saw what I saw.
And now she won't even speak to me.
-Do you want me to come with you? -No, thanks.
All right, well, be careful.
He's gone, Maya.
You know that.
See you.
Izabella, it's Maya.
Will you just open the door?
Please. I just need to talk to you about Joe.
translation.it: Per favore. Devo parlarti di Joe.

translation.en: I know you're in.
I can see your feet.
I'm sorry I grabbed you. I panicked. Just…
translation.it: Scusa per la foga. Ero nel panico.

translation.en: Just please open the door.
Ah, hi.
What's all this?
Oh yeah, they, uh-- they changed it. Don't know why.
translation.it: Sì, me l'hanno cambiata. Non so perché.

translation.en: It's awful.
It's a car.
It's green.
Looks like Kermit. Kermit vomit.
Feel free to walk home after dance lesson.
translation.it: Torna pure a piedi dopo la lezione di ballo.

translation.en: -I'd rather. -Do.
I will.
Very nice.
-[teacher] That's it. -Disappointing.
-I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know the-- -I'll close up late.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto. Non so… - Per me andava bene. - Tranquilla.

translation.en: -Don't worry. -Thought it was lovely.
-You do know-- -Yeah, sure.
-You're making me look bad. -Yeah, yeah.
-That was bad. -[chuckling]
-Drag. Drag. -♪ You're my symphony ♪
-[teacher] Two, three, four. Slide. Slide. -♪ You're the most supreme ♪
-Stop it. Stop. -Stop.
-I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. -Um…
-Sorry. -[Molly laughs]
How long till the wedding?
-Stop it. Don't laugh. -[laughing]
-Four weeks. -Four weeks. Yeah.
We've got our work cut out.
Stop it, please. Please.
-[sniffles] -Sorry.
[coach] Don't give the ball away. Chase it. Chase it. Keep moving. Come on.
translation.it: Non date via la palla. Rincorretela. Muovetevi, avanti.

translation.en: Let's go.
-Go on, Abby! Go on! -[coach] Pretend it's a donut, Abby.
translation.it: Forza, Abby! Fai finta di rincorrere una ciambella, Abby.

translation.en: That'll get you moving. My granny could play better than you.
translation.it: Fai finta di rincorrere una ciambella, Abby. Mia nonna giocava meglio.

translation.en: Move it. Faster, you bloody donkeys! Come on!
Faster! Talk to each other! Come on!
Don't give it away!
[coach] Chase it! Quicker. Quicker. Come on!
Come on!
Abby, challenge! Challenge!
Awful.
-Ref! Number five. -[whistle blows]
Abby, off.
Off!
Awful.
Woeful.
Maybe ease up on the cakes. Yeah? Your bulk's not helping.
translation.it: Magari mangia meno dolci. La ciccia non aiuta.

translation.en: -Hey! Coach. -Middle of a game here.
-Yeah, I'm Maya Stern. I'm Abby's aunt. -Maya, don't.
translation.it: Sono Maya Stern. La zia di Abby. - Maya, no. - Sì, so chi è lei, Capitana.

translation.en: [coach] Yeah, I know who you are, Captain.
translation.it: - Maya, no. - Sì, so chi è lei, Capitana.

translation.en: -I'm talking to you. -What?
They're kids. I'm ex-forces, and I've heard sergeant majors go easier.
translation.it: Sono ragazzine. Ho visto sergenti più gentili di lei.

translation.en: -They're embarrassing themselves. -No, no, you are.
-You can't speak to kids like that. -Who the hell are you? I'm a winner.
translation.it: Non può trattarle così. Ma che vuole? Io voglio vincere.

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah? You want rainbows and bluebells?
Well, get her in the art club. Now, excuse me. I’m coaching a team.
translation.it: La mandi al club di arte. E ora mi lasci lavorare.

translation.en: Okay, yeah. You're a rude man.
-Whatever. -Yeah.
-Don't turn your back on me. -Get off.
I said, don't turn your back on me!
Cunt.
-You fucking-- -Go on.
Give me an excuse to put you down.
-[tense music playing] -Go on.
-Nah, you're not worth it. -Yeah, I thought so.
translation.it: - Non ne vali la pena. - Già, immaginavo.

translation.en: -Bye. [chuckles] -Do one.
Come on, wake up!
You okay?
Yeah? Don't worry. Come on.
[Eddie] Maya.
-Wait in the car, please. -Oh, here we go.
-I don't want you around my children. -Oh, Eddie, come on. The guy was a bully.
translation.it: - Stai lontana dai miei figli. - Dai, era un bullo.

translation.en: It's not just that.
-You don't get it, do you? -No. Obviously I don't. No.
The army. That incident.
Then Claire, now Joe.
Death follows you, Maya.
You sure you've only had that one drink?
You think I wasn't torn in half when my sister died?
translation.it: Credi non fossi a pezzi quando è morta mia sorella?

translation.en: I wasn't even here, Eddie. They're her kids.
translation.it: Non ero nemmeno qui. Loro sono i suoi figli.

translation.en: -They're all I have left of her. -Stay away.
translation.it: - Ciò che mi resta. - Stai lontana.

translation.en: -No, you can't do that! -You stay the fuck away!
In the car, please!
Dick.
So, I spoke with Sharon about the dress.
translation.it: Ho parlato con Sharon del vestito.

translation.en: She said that this little fella will definitely show,
translation.it: Ha detto che questo piccoletto si vedrà sicuramente,

translation.en: but she said she can do some kind of,
I don't know, frill thing to conceal it a bit.
translation.it: non so, una specie di balza per nasconderlo.

translation.en: But everyone attending knows that you're pregnant, so…
translation.it: Ma tutti gli invitati sanno che sei incinta, quindi…

translation.en: It's our wedding day, Sami.
I want to look the blushing bride… -[sighs] -…not like we're dashing down the aisle
translation.it: Voglio sembrare una dolce sposina, non una costretta a sposarsi

translation.en: because you managed to slip one past the goalie.
translation.it: perché tu non sei uscito in tempo.

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
Hello?
What's up?
I'm sorry, it's just…
It's just this murder.
Plus, they gave me a partner.
Is that a bad thing?
Yes.
He's about three. A health nut.
Duran Duran came on the radio. He'd never even heard of them.
translation.it: Alla radio c'erano i Duran Duran. Non li conosceva.

translation.en: -What a bastard. -No, no. [sighs]
Never heard of Duran Duran?
I'm not saying he should like them, not saying he should recite their lyrics,
translation.it: Non dico che deve amarli o sapere i testi delle canzoni,

translation.en: but he never even heard of them.
translation.it: ma non ne ha mai sentito parlare.

translation.en: No, I agree. He should be fired immediately.
translation.it: No, hai ragione. Dovrebbe essere licenziato all'istante.

translation.en: Come here, you big, daft bugger.
-Listen. -[exhales]
It's a job, Sami.
An important job, but a job nonetheless.
translation.it: Un lavoro importante, ma pur sempre un lavoro.

translation.en: Yeah. Yep, yep, yep.
Come here.
Two, thanks.
-Same again? -Yes.
-Some fresh-- -Yeah, no, I told him.
Hello?
Yo. It's Marty. I've, um, just sent you the ballistics report on the bullets that killed Joe Burkett.
translation.it: Sono Marty. Ti ho appena mandato il rapporto balistico sui proiettili.

translation.en: Have you got it?
Yeah, yeah, I got it.
Yeah. You're not going to believe your eyes.
translation.it: Sì. Non crederai ai tuoi occhi.

translation.en: BULLETS MATCH THOSE FROM A 9MM GLOCK 17 4TH GEN
translation.it: PROIETTILI DI GLOCK 17 9 MM QUARTA GENERAZIONE

translation.en: -[Shane] Who wants a hot dog? -[Maya] Shane, got you this.
translation.it: - Chi vuole un hot dog? - Shane, tieni.

translation.en: -[Shane] Beer! -There you go. Here you are, Bono.
-Thank you. -When's your next tour kicking off?
-Two weeks now. -[Maya] Two weeks?
-God, that's soon. -I know.
Gotta say, I'm glad you're not going back there.
translation.it: Sono felice che non debba tornarci.

translation.en: Although if it wasn't for you, Brian wouldn't be here. So…
translation.it: Anche se senza di te, Ben non sarebbe qui.

translation.en: -[clinks] -Not sure whether that's a good thing.
translation.it: Non so se sia un bene.

translation.en: -I know what you're gonna do. -No? -Mm, yeah! -[bottle clinking]
translation.it: - No, so che cosa vuoi fare. - No? Invece sì.

translation.en: -No! Shane! -Toast!
-For God's sake. -Toast!
-Come on in. Gather in. -[Maya] I hate when he does this.
-Maya. -[Maya] No.
-Yes. Well, I wanted to thank you… -[chuckles]
…for having us bunch of degenerates over at your humble palace, maybe?
translation.it: per aver accolto un branco di degenerati nel tuo umile… palazzo?

translation.en: And I think I speak for everybody when I say…
translation.it: E penso di parlare per tutti quando dico:

translation.en: [breathes deeply] …we've missed you loads, little sister.
-Thank you. -[Shane] Haven't we?
[all] Yeah.
Hey, stay strong.
-Oh, for God's sake, stop it! -Okay, okay, okay.
-To Maya… -Sit down. -…the best combat copter pilot I've ever flown with, our Captain.
translation.it: A Maya, la miglior pilota di elicotteri d'attacco e la nostra Capitana.

translation.en: -[all] To Maya! -Sit down.
And little Lily the hurricane!
-[all] Cheers. -[man] Cheers, mate.
[Maya sighs in relief] Cheers. You okay?
-[Maya] Stop it. -Stop what?
You. You're treating me like a widow.
Maya, I hate to break it to you, but that's exactly what you are.
translation.it: Mi dispiace dirtelo, ma è quello che sei.

translation.en: Which is convenient, really, because you've always suited black.
translation.it: È anche comodo, dato che ti vesti sempre di nero.

translation.en: I know this is going to sound crazy, Shane.
But I keep thinking that I'm seeing him.
It's natural, Maya.
People do this all the time.
When you lose someone, it's like…
I dunno. It's like you still want them to be there, you know?
translation.it: Non so, è come se volessi che fosse ancora lì.

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm going to sound even crazier now when I tell you this.
translation.it: Questo ti sembrerà ancora più assurdo.

translation.en: I think I'm being followed.
By who?
I don't know.
I've seen the same car twice.
translation.it: Ho visto la stessa auto due volte.

translation.en: I've noted down the plate. It's a red Volkswagen.
translation.it: Ho preso la targa. È una Volkswagen rossa.

translation.en: -Do you think you can find the owner? -[sighs] Not legally.
translation.it: Puoi scoprire di chi è? - Non legalmente. - Però puoi.

translation.en: Yeah, but you can.
Yeah, send it to me.
Thanks.
-Mother-in-law. -Good luck.
Hello?
Maya, what happened? Izabella's saying she won't work for you anymore.
translation.it: Cos'è successo? Izabella dice che non lavorerà più per te.

translation.en: She's here now.
Right, well, don't let her leave. I'll come over now, yeah? Keep her there.
translation.it: Non lasciarla andare. Vengo subito, ok? Trattienila.

translation.en: -Shane-- -Look after Lily?
-Yeah. -Got you.
-Luka. -You attack her.
-Izabella! What'd you do with the SD card? -Fuck you. She's scared of you!
translation.it: Izabella! Che ne hai fatto della scheda SD? - Ha paura di te! - Fammi passare, o giuro…

translation.en: Let me past, or I swear to God--
translation.it: - Ha paura di te! - Fammi passare, o giuro…

translation.en: -Leave her alone. -I just need to talk to her about Joe.
translation.it: - Lasciala stare. - Devo solo parlarle di Joe.

translation.en: -Leave her-- -She fucking pepper sprayed me!
You can't run from this!
Why did you let her leave?
What was I supposed to do? Keep her prisoner?
I needed to speak with her, Judith.
She says you attacked her.
-I didn't attack her. -You laid hands on her?
translation.it: - Non è così. - Le hai messo le mani addosso?

translation.en: -Yes. -Then what's the difference, Maya?
-Why did you do that? -Why was she here?
translation.it: - Perché l'hai fatto? - Perché era qui?

translation.en: Well, her family has been employed by ours for many years.
translation.it: La sua famiglia lavora per noi da molti anni.

translation.en: -Long before you came. -Oh, so you believe her?
translation.it: - Da molto prima che arrivassi. - Le credi?

translation.en: Does it matter that I was married to your son? Does it matter that I'm the mother of your grandchild?
translation.it: Ti importa che io sia la moglie di tuo figlio? La madre di tua nipote?

translation.en: She says she caught you spying.
And did she tell you what I saw?
No. No.
I saw Joe.
I saw Joe, Judith.
On the camera.
I don't know how, but that's what I saw.
translation.it: Non so come, ma è quello che ho visto.

translation.en: So answer me this.
How can a dead man appear on a secret camera?
translation.it: Come può un morto apparire in una telecamera?

translation.en: How can-- How can a dead man cuddle his own daughter?
translation.it: Come può un morto abbracciare sua figlia?

translation.en: Stop it. Stop this.
Now, you know that can't be true.
translation.it: Sai che non può essere vero.

translation.en: -You… wanted to see him… -[scoffs] …so you saw him.
translation.it: Tu… volevi vederlo, così l'hai visto.

translation.en: -And then you started accusing Izabella. -It wasn't a vision, Judith. He was there.
translation.it: - E poi hai accusato Izabella. - Non era una visione, Judith. Era lì.

translation.en: Maya, it's your subconscious.
Don't fucking analyze me, Judith.
-Please don't swear in my home. -I know what I saw.
translation.it: - Non imprecare. - So cosa ho visto.

translation.en: What, my dead son whom we buried?
I'm going to tell you the truth now, Maya. I'm worried about you.
translation.it: Ti dirò la verità, Maya. Sono preoccupata per te.

translation.en: All those things you went through when you were abroad.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che hai passato in missione.

translation.en: -I'm fine. -You never dealt with them.
-Are you saying I'm going mad? -No, I'm saying you never dealt with them.
translation.it: - Cioè sto impazzendo? - No, ma non l'hai affrontato.

translation.en: Or the scandal that followed.
And if I'm to be brutally honest,
I wonder whether you are in a fit state to be looking after that little girl right now.
translation.it: mi chiedo se tu sia in condizione di occuparti della bambina.

translation.en: Don't you dare question my parenting.
translation.it: Non osare mettere in dubbio le mie capacità di madre.

translation.en: I saw him.
And I'm not going mad.
Did you love him, Maya?
What?
Simple question. My son, did you love him?
translation.it: È una domanda semplice. Amavi mio figlio?

translation.en: You know I did.
Because I did, to my core.
But sometimes, when you were together--
translation.it: Ma a volte, quando stavate insieme…

translation.en: -I loved him! -[dramatic sting]
But if I'm honest, Judith…
I did often wonder, was there a voice in his ear,
translation.it: spesso mi chiedevo se una voce gli sussurrasse all'orecchio,

translation.en: a little voice…
saying, "Is she good enough…
this bit of rough?"
"Was she really good enough for my special boy?"
translation.it: "Vale abbastanza per il mio ragazzo speciale?"

translation.en: Because I'm not one of you.
translation.it: Perché non sono una di voi.

translation.en: Am I?
And I never will be.
[Maya] Okay, come in.
Hiya.
We're just having a bit of a barbecue.
Maya, the, um, 9-millimeter bullets we recovered from your husband's body,
translation.it: La balistica ha analizzato i proiettili estratti dal corpo di suo marito

translation.en: we ran them through ballistics to see if the bullets matched any of the cases on our database.
translation.it: per scoprire se corrispondessero ad altri casi nel nostro database.

translation.en: And they did.
They did.
The gun that killed your husband…
translation.it: La pistola che ha ucciso suo marito…

translation.en: -was also used to kill your sister… -[eerie music playing]
…Claire Walker.
